get.summary: To retrieve the list of quizzes created by the authenticated user.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: To filter the quiz results by quiz title. Example. Demo Quiz

parameters.name: clientUserId
parameters.description: External user id which is used at the time of authentication.

parameters.name: quizType
parameters.description: By default, lists all the general quizzes created by the user . If we select, 'c' it will lists the custom quizzes created by the user .

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Per page how many records to list

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Fieldname with + or - for ascending or descending sort. Ex : -title : to sort in descending order, +title to sort in ascending order

parameters.name: tests
parameters.description: create new quiz details

get.summary: To Retrieve the particular quiz details by Quiz Id.

parameters.name: clientUserId
parameters.description: External user id which is used at the time of authentication.

parameters.name: quizId
parameters.description: Created Quiz Id.

parameters.name: quizId
parameters.description: Quiz Id to delete

parameters.name: clientUserId
parameters.description: External user id which is used at the time of authentication.

parameters.name: quizId
parameters.description: Quiz Id to update

parameters.name: Tests
parameters.description: To Update Existing Quiz Details

parameters.name: quizId
parameters.description: Quiz Id

parameters.name: clientUserId
parameters.description: External user id which is used at the time of authentication.

parameters.name: summary
parameters.description: If its true, it will get the instance attempted progress details along with instance details. If its false, it will get only instance details.

post.summary: Create quiz instance for the given quiz id  and associate the questions to instance.

parameters.name: quizId
parameters.description: Quiz Id

parameters.name: clientUserId
parameters.description: External user id which is used at the time of authentication.

get.summary: Progress details for the particular instance.

parameters.name: quizId
parameters.description: Quiz Id

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: Quiz Instance Id

parameters.name: clientUserId
parameters.description: External user id which is used at the time of authentication.

parameters.name: summary
parameters.description: If its true, it will get the instance attempted progress details along with instance details. If its false, it will get only instance details.

parameters.name: quizId
parameters.description: Quiz Id

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: Quiz Instance Id

parameters.name: clientUserId
parameters.description: External user id which is used at the time of authentication.

get.summary: Progress details for the given subject/topic/subtopic.

parameters.name: clientmetadataId
parameters.description: Random Client Metadata Id shared to client. Example : SC_01

parameters.name: clientUserId
parameters.description: External user id which is used at the time of authentication.

parameters.name: metadataValueId
parameters.description: Id of the subject/topic/subtopic of which you want to get the progress details.

parameters.name: authenticate
parameters.description: User authentication token generation Details

get.summary: Get all the products and its sub products details
Get all the subjects and its topics details for the given product id(s).

parameters.name: productIds
parameters.description: This can be sinlge product Id or multiple product ids seperated by comms. Example : 10000 (for single product id), 10000,11000 (for multiple product ids)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Random Client Metadata Id shared to client. Example : SC_01

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: This can be sinlge product Id or multiple product ids seperated by comms. Example : 10000 (for single product id), 10000,11000 (for multiple product ids)

parameters.name: clientmetadataId
parameters.description: Random Client Metadata Id shared to client. Example : SC_01

parameters.name: clientUserId
parameters.description: External user id which is used at the time of authentication.

get.summary: Get Taxonomy Details for the given taxonomy id. This is generic to subjects/topics/subtopics

parameters.name: clientmetadataId
parameters.description: Random Client Metadata Id  shared to client. Example : SC_01

parameters.name: clientUserId
parameters.description: External user id which is used at the time of authentication.

parameters.name: metadataValueId
parameters.description: This can be subject/topic/subtopic id. Example : 4571

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Fieldname with + or - for ascending or descending sort. Ex : -title : to sort in descending order, +title to sort in ascending order

get.summary: Get Snomed Details for the given metadata id or snomed id

parameters.name: taxonomyId
parameters.description: This can be metadata id(s) or snomed id(s). Multiple ids should be seperated with comma. Example : 2013 (for metadata), 26436007 (for snomed id)

parameters.name: taxonomyType
parameters.description: If we are passing metadata id, then Type = 'QB', if we are passing snomed ids then Type = 'snomed'

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: No of child levels. Example : Level=1 or Level=2

get.summary: Provides questions list for requested snomed ids or metadata ids from solr.

parameters.name: conceptId
parameters.description: Subject / Topic / Subtopic Id.

parameters.name: conceptType
parameters.description: concept Type

AuthenticateRequest.description: Authenticate the external partner and thier users.

clientCode.description: Client Code which is maintained by quizzing platform to authorise the client

secretKey.description: Secret Key which is maintained by quizzing platform to authorise the client

clientUserId.description: External user id which is used at the time of authentication.

AuthenticateResponse.description: It gives access token, that has to be passed in header for all subsequent api calls.

token.description: This is to authorize client and the requested user. This has to be passed in all the api's.

ProductsResponse.description: This gives all the products and it sub products list.

subProducts.description: This gives the sub product details.

TaxonomyResponse.description: This gives all the subjects and its topics details along with if any quiz created by that user, then that quiz instance details for the given product id/ids

numberOfMetadataQuestions.description: Number of questions asscoaited to the subject. This count includes direct mapping of metadata to subejct and also its topics and subtopics

hasChild.description: This tells wether its having any topics list. If true then it has topics, if its false, then it doen't have any topics.

testId.description: If any general quizzes created by the requested user for this subject, then it show the recent quiz id.

totalTestQuestions.description: This gives, number of questions asscoiated to the recent quiz instance

totalCorrectAnswers.description: This gives, number of correct answers of the recent quiz instance

totaWrongAnswers.description: This gives, number of wrong answers of the recent quiz instance

totalUnAttempted.description: This gives, number of unattempted questions  of the recent quiz instance

numberOfMetadataQuestions.description: Number of questions asscoaited to the topic. This count includes direct mapping of metadata to topic and also its subtopics

hasChild.description: This tells wether its having any sub topics list. If true then it has sub topics, if its false, then it doesn't have any sub topics.

testId.description: If any general quizzes created by the requested user for this topic, then it shows the recent quiz id.

totalTestQuestions.description: This gives, number of questions asscoiated to the recent quiz instance

totalCorrectAnswers.description: This gives, number of correct answers of the recent quiz instance

totaWrongAnswers.description: This gives, number of wrong answers of the recent quiz instance

totalUnAttempted.description: This gives, number of unattempted questions  of the recent quiz instance

SubjectsResponse.description: This gives all the subject details for the given product id(s).

totalMetadata.description: This is the count of subjects mapped to given product id(s)

quizId.description: Its the general quiz id which is created using this subject.

TopicsResponse.description: This gives all the topics details for the given subject id.

totalMetadata.description: This is the count of topics mapped to given subject

hasChild.description: This tells wether topic has sub topics or not

quizId.description: Its the general quiz id which is created using this topic.

SnomedResponse.description: This will give snomed Details for the given metadata id or snomed id.

snomedSolrSearchResponse.description: Provides questions list for requested snomed ids or metadata ids from solr.

snomedIds.description: Snomed ids and its relation ids

snomedDesc.example: Nystagmus (disorder),Episcleritis (disorder),Chemosis of conjunctiva (disorder),Central retinal artery occlusion (disorder),Pain in eye (finding),Deposition of copper (morphologic abnormality),Vitreous detachment (disorder),Central retinal vein occlusion (disorder),Vertical nystagmus (disorder),Floaters in visual field (finding),Retrobulbar hemorrhage (disorder),Edema of optic disc (disorder),Viral pharyngitis (disorder),Viral pharyngitis (disorder),Peritonsillar abscess (disorder),Peritonsillar abscess (disorder),Peritonsillar abscess (disorder),Acute sinusitis (disorder),Impacted cerumen (disorder),Retropharyngeal abscess (disorder),Retropharyngeal abscess (disorder),Sinusitis (disorder),Streptococcal sore throat (disorder),Perforation of tympanic membrane (disorder)

promptText.example: following is true or false of domestic violence

metadataValues.description: Metadata value ids which are mapped to that requested snomed id.

QuizListResponse.description: To retrieve the list of quizzes created by the authenticated user.

total.description: Total number of quizzes created by the user.

instanceId.description: Recent quiz instance id for the particular quiz.

questionTime.description: Time of each question in seconds. Ex. 60 (in seconds).

noOfQuestions.description: Number of questions required to create the quiz.

navigationType.description: 1 - Sequential navigation type and 2 - Random navigation type. If its sequesntial user cannot come to previous question in the engine. If its random user can move between previous and next questions.

quizTime.description: Minimum time to complete the Quiz in minutes . Ex. 30 (in minutes)

randomizeQuestion.description: Display the questions in random order in quiz engine.

quizType.description: By default, lists all the general quizzes created by the user . If we select, 'c' it will lists the custom quizzes created by the user .

reviewMode.description: If review mode is true, then user can see the correct answer immidiately after they attempt the question. If its false, then will not able to see the asnwers immidiately.

newQuestions.description: If new questions is true, then while creating the quiz instance it will consider only new questions and they should not be associated to any old quizzes created by the user. If its false, they it will pick the questions randomly.

gotWrong.description: If got wrong questions is true, then it will consider the previously attempted questions and which are got wrong. If its false, then it will pick the questions randomly.

metadataAssoc.description: Id's of the topics which were selected at the time of quiz creation.

metadataTitle.description: Title  of the topics mapped to the quiz.

instances.description: Listing all the instances of the quiz.

status.description: Its a Test Status.  Example : Completed , Inprogress or NotStarted.

totalTimeSpent.description: Total time spent for the Quiz.  Example : 30 (in minutes).

testProgress.description: Progress details of the each instances.

testProgressDetails.description: Progress details of the each instances.

totalTestQuestions.description: Total number of questions associated with the quiz instance.

totalCorrectAnswers.description: Total number of questions attempted correctly in the quiz instance

totaWrongAnswers.description: Total number of questions attempted  wrongly in the quiz instance

totalUnAttempted.description: Total number of questions which are not attempted in the quiz instance

launchURL.description: QB Url to launch the quiz.

numberOfQuestions.description: Total Number of  questions configured for the Quiz.

testProgress.description: Total Number of  unattempted questions in the quiz instance

id.description: Random client metadata id shared to client. Example : SC_01

clientUserId.description: External user id which is used at the time of authentication.

metadataAssoc.description: Id's of the subject/topic/subtopic to which user wants to create the quiz.

questionTime.description: Time of each question in seconds.

reviewMode.description: If review mode is true, then user can see the correct answer immidiately after they attempt the question. If its false, then will not able to see the asnwers immidiately.

noofQuestions.description: Number of questions required to create the quiz.

newQuestions.description: If new questions is true, then while creating the quiz instance it will consider only new questions and they should not be associated to any old quizzes created by the user. If its false, they it will pick the questions randomly.

gotWrong.description: If got wrong questions is true, then it will consider the previously attempted questions and which are got wrong. If its false, then it will pick the questions randomly.

quizType.description: Its a optional parameter. If we dont provide this, it will be considered as a General Quiz. If we  provide c then it will be created as a Custom Quiz. Generally custom quizzes will be created by selecting multiple topics.

metadataAssoc.description: Id's of the topics which were selected at the time of quiz creation.

QuizInstanceCreateResponse.description: Create quiz instance and return launch url.

QuizProgressBarResponse.description: To retrieves progress of the given subject/topic/subtopic

numberOfMetadataQuestions.description: Number of questions associated to the subject/topic/subtopic.
